root.message: The REC_USE_LIM field for indicator 5-b-1, translated into en
root.data: Although data on the “proportion of individuals who own a cell phone” currently exists for only very few countries, the ITU is encouraging all countries to collect data on this indicator through national surveys and the indicator is expected to be added to the list of indicators of the Partnership on ICT Measurement for development. The number of countries with official data for this indicator is expected to increase in the near future.
